title: Bruschetta
ingredients: Bread, Tomatoes, Garlic, Basil, Olive Oil, Salt, Pepper
instructions: Toast bread slices, rub with garlic, top with chopped tomatoes, basil, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
author: Chef Mario

title: Sigara Böreği
ingredients: Phyllo Dough, Feta Cheese, Parsley, Oil
instructions: Roll cheese mixture in phyllo, fry until golden.
author: Chef Ayşe

title: Tomato Soup
ingredients: Tomatoes, Onion, Garlic, Basil, Cream
instructions: Cook tomatoes and onions, blend with cream and basil.
author: Chef Anna

title: Mercimek Çorbası
ingredients: Lentils, Onion, Carrot, Butter, Mint
instructions: Boil lentils with vegetables, blend, and season.
author: Chef Zeynep

title: Miso Soup
ingredients: Miso Paste, Tofu, Seaweed, Green Onion
instructions: Dissolve miso in hot water, add tofu and seaweed.
author: Chef Hiro

title: Greek Salad
ingredients: Tomatoes, Cucumber, Feta Cheese, Olives, Olive Oil
instructions: Mix ingredients and drizzle with olive oil.
author: Chef Elena

title: Çoban Salata
ingredients: Tomatoes, Cucumber, Onion, Parsley, Olive Oil, Lemon
instructions: Dice all vegetables and mix with olive oil and lemon.
author: Chef Mehmet

ingredients: Lettuce, Croutons, Parmesan, Caesar Dressing
instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing, top with croutons and cheese.
author: Chef Rachel

title: Adana Kebab
ingredients: Ground Lamb, Red Pepper, Spices, Skewers
instructions: Mix ingredients, shape onto skewers, grill over open fire.
author: Chef Mehmet

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Spaghetti, Eggs, Parmesan, Pancetta, Black Pepper
instructions: Cook pasta, toss with eggs, cheese, and pancetta off heat.
author: Chef Marco

title: Sushi Roll
ingredients: Rice, Nori, Fish, Avocado, Cucumber
instructions: Spread rice on nori, add fillings, roll and slice.
author: Chef Sato

title: Tzatziki
ingredients: Yogurt, Cucumber, Garlic, Olive Oil, Dill
instructions: Mix all ingredients and chill before serving.
author: Chef Nikos

title: Hummus
ingredients: Chickpeas, Tahini, Lemon, Garlic, Olive Oil
instructions: Blend ingredients until smooth, drizzle olive oil on top.
author: Chef Leila

title: Guacamole
ingredients: Avocado, Onion, Tomato, Lime, Cilantro, Salt
instructions: Mash avocado, mix with chopped veggies and lime juice.
author: Chef Carlos

ingredients: Chickpeas, Onion, Garlic, Parsley, Cumin, Oil
instructions: Form balls from blended ingredients, deep fry until golden.
author: Chef Nabil

ingredients: Tortilla Chips, Cheese, Jalapenos, Salsa
instructions: Layer chips with cheese and toppings, bake until cheese melts.
author: Chef Sofia

title: Chocolate Cake

instructions: Mix ingredients, bake in preheated oven until done.
author: Chef Emma

ingredients: Phyllo Dough, Nuts, Butter, Sugar, Syrup
instructions: Layer phyllo with nuts, bake, then pour syrup over hot pastry.
author: Chef Ayşe

title: Coffee
ingredients: Coffee Beans, Water
instructions: Brew ground beans with hot water.
author: Barista Anna

title: Fruit Smoothie
ingredients: Mixed Fruits, Yogurt, Honey
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth.
author: Barista Lisa

title: Pancakes
ingredients: Flour, Milk, Eggs, Sugar, Baking Powder
instructions: Mix ingredients, cook batter on griddle until golden.
author: Chef Linda

title: Omelette
ingredients: Eggs, Milk, Butter, Salt, Pepper
instructions: Whisk eggs and milk, cook in buttered pan, fold and serve.
author: Chef Paul

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
ingredients: Mixed Vegetables, Soy Sauce, Garlic, Ginger
instructions: Stir fry vegetables with sauce until crisp-tender.
author: Chef Lin
